José Luis Torrente is the main character and anti-hero of the saga of highest grossing films of Spanish cinema: Torrente el brazo tonto de la ley, Torrente 2: Mission in Marbella, Torrente 3: El Protector Torrente, 4: Lethal Crisis and Torrente 5: Operation Eurovegas, in addition to the official game of the first two installments. It was created and played by Santiago Segura, in the third part of the saga, by Eduardo Garcia in his childhood.
